feed.name: 0compile
feed.summary: Create a binary release from source code

list.feed:
0compile creates a binary from source code, either for your own use or ready for publishing on the web through Zero Install. It can use Zero Install to download any build dependencies (compilers, header files, build tools, etc).
This is useful if ...

feed.name: 0publish
feed.summary: Utility to make creating injector interfaces easier

list.feed:
0publish makes creating and modifying injector interface files easier. It can create a new commented template for you or edit an existing one.
Various editing operations are available, the most basic being to let you edit it in your ...

feed.name: 0publish-gui
feed.summary: GTK editor for Zero Install feeds

list.feed:
Publishing a program using Zero Install requires you to create an XML file listing the available versions, where to get them, and what other software they depend on.
This program provides a simple graphical interface for creating and editing these feeds.

feed.name: 0release
feed.summary: Manage new releases with Zero Install

list.feed: If you have a local feed in the development version of your program, 0release can help you to create new releases easily.
AbiWord is a lightweight word processing application.

This is a panel clock, with support for setting alarms. It can also function in its own window.
This examines a ROX application and reports dependencies the application has declared and also whether it thinks they are fulfilled.

DownloadManager is an optional assistant for Fetch and other download helper programs that use its protocol. DownloadManager monitors the number of active downloads using DBus and limits the quantity by announcing when others may attempt to start.
dxf2G is a simple program that converts dxf 2D files into a .ngc G code files usable in programs such as Emc2 (www.linuxcnc.org).
Edit is a simple text editor, with a ROX-style user interface. It has drag-and- drop saving, search-and-replace and multi-level undo.
Emacs is the extensible, customizable, self-documenting real-time display editor.

FeedLint is a tool for Zero Install feed authors. It checks that your Zero Install feed can be downloaded, that it is valid and that all the links in it still work.
Run this on all your feeds from time-to-time to make sure they still work.

Fetch is a download handler for ROX-Filer.
When a link is dragged from a web browser or similar program to a filer window ROX-Filer calls a user-defined download handler to fetch the object named by the link.

Searches files for specific text, displaying the results in a window. Double click on the result line(s) to open the file at that point.

feed.name: ZeroInstall-GUI
feed.summary: Graphical interface for the Zero Install injector

list.feed: The Zero Install GUI displays a window showing which versions of various components will be used when running a program, and allows you to alter various policy settings to affect the selection process. You can use this to mark particular versions of ...

feed.name: Zombies
feed.summary: Simple robots-like game where you destroy the zombies

list.feed: The idea of zombies is to kill as many zombies as possible. Fortunately for you, zombies can only move diagonally. Once all the zombies on a level die you start a new level, with even more zombies than ...
